content: this beautiful shopper 1 bag with imitation leather bottom is an absolute must have for all bag lovers the bag is worked in hobbii ribbon 2 which is available in an abundance of gorgeous colours make your own shopper bag using your favourite colour and pick out the perfect handle in our wide selection of bag accessories have fun **materials ** crochet hook us size h/8 5 mm if your gauge s usually tight you can use a size j/10 6 mm hobbii ribbon go handmade leather base size str 31 x 10 cm 12 2 x 4 inches handbag strap or handle magnetic lock or magnetic button w flap 4 cm 1 6 inches **measurements ** approx 10 inches 25 cm tall and 15 8 inches 40 cm wide at the top measured lying flat **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **slip_stitch** slip_stitch **blo** back loop only **lsc** long single_crochet **ks** knit stitch **usage ** approx 1lb 2 8 oz 530 g ribbon 3 skeins 1 https //hobbii com/shopper-leather-base-small utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=shopper-leather-base&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/ribbon-hobbii utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=ribbon&utm_term=swr
